entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:09 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 90 gusting to 110 late in the morning. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
